Happy Golden Anniversary to my 2 favoritest people in the World. 
Mrs. Sunil Shah and Mr. Ramesh Shah are the owners and my former employers of Salaam Bombay Restaurant in TriBeCa, NY. I always take my newly released books and seek their blessings before launching any big projects. 
My Gujurati parents, as I call them. 
Iâ€™m forever indebted, thankful and honored for all the opportunities they gave me. 
Congrats on your big day, many more to celebrate. â¤ï¸

You will always be my hero who said, â€œJust remember, that you are my lion.â€ Happy Fathers Day. Everyday. .
.
Please read my lifeâ€™s biggest lesson. 
On Jan 31, 2015, as a morning ritual I called home and to speak to my Mom and Dad. Dad was super excited for 2 reasons, Serena Williams was playing Finals for Australian Open and Mercedes had signed me up for their association. He told me that it was his dream to drive his sonâ€™s Merc. I laughingly said that why didnâ€™t you tell me before, he joked and said â€œyou had never asked.â€ We laughed as usual and disconnected.
At noon on the same day, he passed away. No child can ever be ready for this loss; it leaves a hole in your heart. Makes you feel empty, betrayed by Gods and unprotected to the World.
I still wonder about the line he said â€œyou had never asked.â€
So many times since that unfortunate day, I wish I could have done more for him, made him proud, and fulfill all his wishes.
Life lesson - Donâ€™t wait for a single more moment. Our parents might never ask for anything and just give all their lives for us. 
Surprise them, spoil them, hug them, ask them about their dreams, and loveeee them. Because one day you might be able to buy a fleet of cars, but you cant buy time. 
Love You Papa. Miss You. â¤ï¸

Iâ€™ve spent hours and hours at security checks in my life. 
A lot of the people at the International Airports would know me as MasterChef. 
But many times when they see my last name, they get confused. Yes, my last name is â€œKhannaâ€ and it confuses and alerts security as they read â€œKhan.....naâ€. And on top of that I openly confess that â€œI have a Ma and also an Ammiâ€ when they ask about my background. 
But itâ€™s become so stereotypical in the last few years for additional â€œrandomâ€ security checks. After a longgg check today they found (6 oz) Colgate toothpaste. ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
I let it go. 
Life is such. Some days you win and on some you lose, but eventually life continues. ğŸ™ğŸ¼
.
.
Keep the toothpaste, but not letting go of that smile. ğŸ˜Š

#SacredFoodsOfIndia will be my 35th Book. 
The book is inspired by my Documentary Series - Holy Kitchens. 
It would reflect the true fabric and foundation of Mother India. 
The Foods that are for spiritual sustenance and for bringing the communities together. 
From Hinduâ€™s Temples to Sikhâ€™s Gurdwaras to Jain Temples to Jewâ€™s Synagogues to Muslimâ€™s Dargahs to Buddhistâ€™s Monasteries to the Kitchens of Mother Theresas to Zoroastrianâ€™s Fire Temples and much more. 
It will be a work of art, never witnessed before. â¤ï¸
#JaiHo #CreatingMagic

And its a wrap. Recipe testing, food photography. Non-stop research. 24/7 Devotion. #SacredFoodsOfIndia

- SAIL -
Remember the music, ignore the noise
There would always be another choice
To wake up is the greatest gift of all
Ignore fears and hear the inner call
Forget the number of times you fail
Persistence will teach you how to sail
Scars are the symbol of your survival
Move on! Itâ€™s your moment of revival

Yours truly.....VK
